\f0\fs26 \cf0 This package installs the following files:\ \ /usr/local/bin/dotlocal\ /usr/local/man/man1/dotlocal.1\ \ You can safely uninstall the package by deleting these files.\ \ You will need to have /usr/local/bin in your $PATH to be able to use the program.}

requirement.message: Mac OS X Snow Leopard or higher is required to install this program.
